{{Infobox album | name = Thankful / Thankful (Unwrapped) | type = ep | artist = [[New Kids on the Block]] | cover = Thankful EP.jpg | alt = | released = {{Start date|2017|5|12}}
{{Start date|2017|12|1}} (Re-Release) | recorded = | venue = | studio = | genre = | length = | label = NKOTB Music | producer = | prev_title = [[10 (New Kids on the Block album)|10]] | prev_year = 2013 | next_title = | next_year = | misc = {{Singles | name = Thankful | type = ep | single1 = One More Night | single1date = March 7, 2017 }} }} '''''Thankful''''' is the first [[extended play]] by American [[pop music|pop]] group [[New Kids on the Block]], released on May 12, 2017. "One More Night" was released as the first single on March 7, 2017. The song was premiered live on ''[[The Late Late Show with James Corden]]'' on March 6, 2017.{{cite magazine|last=Blistein |first=Jon |url=https://www.rollingstone.com/music/news/hear-new-kids-on-the-blocks-new-single-one-more-night-w470760 |title=Hear New Kids on the Block's New Single 'One More Night' |magazine=[[Rolling Stone]] |date=March 7, 2017 |accessdate=March 12, 2017}} On December 1, 2017, they released an expanded edition of the EP called ''Thankful (Unwrapped)'' which included the original EP plus the Target bonus track with DMX (now available digitally/streaming) as well as three newly-recorded holiday songs "Unwrap You" "One Night of Peace" and "December Love."https://www.amazon.com/Thankful-Unwrapped-New-Kids-Block/dp/B077PY1R83/ ==Track listing== {{Track listing | headline = Digital download version{{cite web|url=https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/thankful-ep/id1211810397 |title=Thankful – EP by New Kids On the Block on Apple Music |website=Itunes.apple.com |accessdate=March 12, 2017}} | extra_column = Producer(s) | title1 = Heartbeat | writer1 = Demetrius L. Bledsoe, Kelvin Parker, Tanya White | extra1 = Kelvin Parker, Freckles TheWriter | length1 = 3:24 | title2 = Thankful | writer2 = [[James Abrahart]], [[Sarah Hudson (singer)|Sarah Hudson]], [[Jesse Saint John]], [[Rob Persaud]] | extra2 = Persaud | length2 = 3:35 | title3 = One More Night | writer3 = [[Jussifer|Jussi Karvinen]], Jared Lee, Lee Anna McCollum | extra3 = [[Jussifer]] | length3 = 3:17 | title4 = Hard (Not Luvin U) | writer4 = [[Damon Sharpe]], [[Eric Sanicola]] | extra4 = Sharpe, Sanicola | length4 = 3:19 | title5 = Still Sounds Good | writer5 = [[Gabe Lopez]], [[Joey McIntyre]], Brent Paschke, Drew Ryan Scott, [[Donnie Wahlberg]] | extra5 = McIntyre, Paschke, Lopez | length5 = 3:14 }} {{Track listing | collapsed = no | headline = Target edition bonus track{{cite web|url=http://intl.target.com/p/-/A-52342375 |title=Target : Expect More. Pay Less |website=Intl.target.com |accessdate=March 12, 2017}} | extra_column = Producer(s) | title6 = We Were Here | note6 = featuring [[DMX (rapper)|DMX]] | writer6 = | extra6 = [[Deekay]] | length6 = 4:21 }} {{Track listing | collapsed = no | headline = ''Unwrapped'' Bonus Trackshttps://www.amazon.com/Thankful-Unwrapped-New-Kids-Block/dp/B077PY1R83/ | extra_column = Producer(s) | title7 = Unwrap You | note7 = | writer7 = | extra7 = | length7 = 4:02 | title8 = One Night of Peace | note8 = | writer8 = | extra8 = | length8 = 4:05 | title9 = December Love | note9 = | writer9 = | extra9 = | length9 = 3:49 }} ;Notes *"Still Sounds Good" contains portions of "[[99 Luftballons]]", written by [[Jörn-Uwe Fahrenkrog-Petersen]] and [[Carlo Karges]]. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak
position |- {{album chart|BillboardCanada|29|M|url=http://www.fyimusicnews.ca/articles/2017/05/22/charts-may-22-2017|title=On The Charts: May 22, 2017|publisher=FYIMusicNews|artist=New Kids on the Block|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 23, 2017}} |- ! scope="row"| New Zealand Heatseekers Albums ([[Recorded Music NZ|RMNZ]]){{cite web|url=http://nztop40.co.nz/chart/albums?chart=4363|title=NZ Heatseekers Albums Chart|publisher=[[Recorded Music NZ]]|date=May 22, 2017|accessdate=May 19, 2017}} | 5 |- {{album chart|Scotland|55|date=2017-05-19|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |- {{album chart|UK2|82|date=2017-05-19|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |- {{album chart|UKIndependent|10|date=2017-05-19|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |- {{album chart|Billboard200|17|artist=New Kids on the Block|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 23, 2017}} |- {{album chart|BillboardIndependent|1|artist=New Kids on the Block|rowheader=true|accessdate=May 23, 2017}} |} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{New Kids on the Block}} [[Category:2017 debut EPs]] [[Category:New Kids on the Block albums]]
